response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe would greatly benefit you. After careful consideration and assessment of its worth, I propose to sell this item to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value I receive for such a significant asset. I trust that this offer will be attractive given the product's intrinsic value to you, estimated at $1,200,000. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 1350000}
